text: Oprah once told a group of Harvard graduates : “ There is no such thing as failure. Failure is just life trying to move us in another direction. ” In our series The Setback, OprahMag. com digital director Arianna Davis chats with successful women about a life obstacle they thought was the worst thing that happened to them — until it ended up being the best thing. In today's social media - driven culture, anyone can call themselves a ` ` trailblazer'' or ` ` influencer.'' But model Ashley Graham can actually claim both titles. After signing to Wilhelmina Models at age 14, the Lincoln, Nebraska native first grabbed national attention in 2010 when she appeared in a Lane Bryant commercial that was given limited airtime on networks like ABC and FOX because of its ` `
